page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: A main road, A403 crosses the north west corner of this section; it is extensively used by goods vehicles and cars as it links with the M5, Scotland-Exeter Motorway 3 miles south and the M4 London-South Wales Motorway 7 miles north. A minor road through Hallen is used by workers from the industrial complex into Bristol. A country road built on the route of the old cart track from Gloucester to Shirehampton ferry crosses the minor road in the village. Unmetalled road and tracks lead to the farms and industrial workings.
